passage_text: Fast-paced. Results-oriented. Collaborative. Our high-growth, Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) company, voted one of the Top 50 Best Places to Work in the U.S. by Glassdoor and one of the Best Places to Work in New Jersey by NJBIZ, is looking for top talent.

iCIMS, Inc. is an American software company founded in 1999. It is a provider of software-as-a-service (SaaS) talent acquisition software solutions for growing businesses. iCIMS' flagship product, the Talent Platform, supports clients from a wide range of industries.

iCIMS. iCIMS, Inc. provides Software-as-a-Service talent management platforms. The company offers Talent Platform, a tracking and recruiting software. It also provides support, consulting, technical, global, implementation, training and education, and customer advisory services.

iCIMS is headquartered in central New Jersey, with offices in London, Beijing, New York, San Diego, Denver, Tampa, Portland Portland, Dallas, and Vancouver. Its name is an acronym of Internet Collaborative Information Management System.

iCIMS, Inc. provides Software-as-a-Service talent management platforms. The company offers Talent Platform, a tracking and recruiting software. It also provides support, consulting, technical, global, implementation, training and education, and customer advisory services.

iCIMS is a talent acquisition and onboarding solutions featuring a branded career portal. Career portals are customizable, allowing candidates to search for jobs in an environment that matches the company brand.
